Installation GuideÂ¶

For optimal performance SPGL1 requires the compilation of several Mex files. This can be done from Matlab by running spgsetup from the SPGL1 directory. In some cases the Mex compiler needs to be configured first. This can be done by calling mex -setup (see here for more information).
